name: Stacky Block
description:
PUT YOUR REACTION SPEED TO THE TEST! 

Tap to drop blocks at precise moments and try to stack the highest tower you can. 

A game that inspired me was the arcade game Stacker. I wanted to capture the feeling of arcade games through the quick reaction speed and the randomness of the blocks.

I made this game mainly to learn the process of gamedev, so If you have any advice, critique, or questions feel free to PM me or leave a comment.

This game can also be found in app format  on Android:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.potat0.stackyblock

Android additional feature: Leaderboard
